name: Caves Lava and Spikes
description:
Hi there, this is my demo game and although it's very short and experimental it has 10 levels to play, it still in the early stages of development (alpha demo stages), but 5-10 minutes of gameplay!

 It was designed to be speedrun friendly and somewhat "difficult".  

I hope you enjoy! I will read all comments and do my best to fix bugs and bring the best experience possible!

I'm still trying to learn how to code and draw, the game was a solo entry into a game jam, but I really liked the idea so I'll try to make it the best game possible!
